Mary Ellen
Breastfeeding is Y2K Compliant

messages.subject: Tax-funded preschool for all children
messages.msgSnippet: Life is a big race, so the sooner we can get the little tikes in the thick of it, the more useful and competitive they will be in the inevitable coming
messages.messageBody:
Life is a big race, so the sooner we can get the little tikes in the thick
of it, the more useful and competitive they will be in the "inevitable"
coming global economy ruled by multinational corporations.

http://www.csmonitor.com/durable/1999/12/17/fp1s1-csm.shtml

Is this what we truly want?

John
http://members.xoom.com/joandersen
